Description:
How difficult could it be to reduce a PDF file size? Apparently, in this instance, very!
Google Docs generated PDFs have risen to monstrous sizes, relatively speaking (and I’m not alone). Recently, I needed to convert a Google Docs generted PDF, which was coming out to be at 5 MB, under a certain size (2MB) due to an upload limit. I tried to compress the said PDF through MacOS Preview’s built in “Reduce File Size” filters which in this rare instance didn’t work.
